title: DST timeouts

timeline_data.body: I suspect this is related to the DST change.

Issue Number: 20502
Status: Closed
Actual Components: test failure
Actual Assignees: No one :(

performed_via_github_app.name: GitHub Actions
performed_via_github_app.description: Automate your workflow from idea to production

timeline_data.body: I admit the name sounds suspicious, but I think this is unlikely to cause hangs.  Unless there was some pre-existing race condition where more a more efficient spin loop changed the timing and exposed problems.
